titles.title: To provide that the State and local income tax withholding provisions of section 11502 of title 49, United States Code, shall not apply to the Metro-North Railroad or its employees.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 11/14/2002--Introduced. Excludes Metro-North Railroad and its employees from otherwise applicable provisions requiring the withholding and reporting of State and local income taxes only for the State and locality where an employee actually resides (as opposed to works).
